code-runner.executorMap.python: conda activate pow; pyinstaller -F app.spec && dist/app $dir$fileNameWithoutExt

python.formatting.yapfArgs: --style={BASED_ON_STYLE: google, BLANK_LINES_AROUND_TOP_LEVEL_DEFINITION: 1, COLUMN_LIMIT: 80, CONTINUATION_INDENT_WIDTH: 4, INDENT_BLANK_LINES: true, INDENT_WIDTH: 4, JOIN_MULTIPLE_LINES: true, SPACES_BEFORE_COMMENT: 1, SPLIT_COMPLEX_COMPREHENSION: true}
